TImage Struct Reference
[Class Image]

All the information about a general image. More...

Detailed Description

All the information about a general image.

Pixels consists of either 1, 8 or 24 bits per pixel. This type can be saved to disk as a graphic file-type (BMP or PGM). Always remember to call k_InitImage() after creating a variable of this type. The members in the struct can be seen under "parameters"

See also:
TPalette , TFileInfo , TIplText , TStatistic

Definition at line 56 of file kernel_functions.h.

Field Documentation

UINT16 TImage::Bits
 

Parameters:
Bits  per pixel (bit planes): 1,4,8 or 24

UINT8** TImage::ppAllScanLines
 

Parameters:
Pointer  pointer to all scan lines. This includes border in y-direction, excl. border in x-dir (internal use only)
